twynes.name: Introduction to the Tournament
twynes.description: An engaging overview of the frisbee tournament, setting the scene and outlining its significance and scale.

twynes.name: Team Background
twynes.description: A deep dive into the history and formation of your frisbee team, highlighting key members and their contributions.

twynes.name: Preliminary Rounds
twynes.description: Key highlights from the preliminary matches, focusing on teamwork, strategy adjustments, and initial challenges.

twynes.name: Finals and Rivalry
twynes.description: An in-depth look at the finals, especially the games against the rival team that beat your team twice, underscoring the rivalry and competitive spirit.

twynes.name: Community and Growth
twynes.description: Showcases the community support for the team, and the personal and collective growth experienced during the tournament.

twynes.name: Reflection and Future
twynes.description: Reflections from team members on their experiences, and their thoughts and aspirations for future tournaments.
